title: Sanath Nishantha, Moratuwa Mayor granted bail
body_lines: Three suspects including SLPP parliamentarian Sanath Nishantha and Moratuwa Mayor Saman Lal Fernando were today ordered to be released on bail by Colombo Fort Magistrate.
They were held in remand custody in connection connection with the incidents took place at Galle Face on May 9. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
